knowme.title: know me
knowme.pesentation: I’m Simão PEDRO. I designed this site so you can get to know me on a personal level. My career as a network designer,as a programmer. Some articles, my personal projects, my blog, my favorite quotes, and so much more. So please sit back and enjoy!

webdevelop.title: Web develop
webdevelop.content: My services make available to the client a series of efficient solutions and able to represent their business on the Internet in the best way, through a Web Site with an attractive and functional presentation

mobileapp.title: Mobile Aplications
mobileapp.content: I develop mobile applications with good reliability using state-of-the-art technologies, thus developing hybrid applications (using Ionic 3) that will reduce the cost of developing the customer's product

dbdesign.title: DB Design
dbdesign.content: This is a solution that I propose to those who want to model and implement a database in their companies or web sites

networks.title: Networks
networks.content: Every company needs a computer network. I propose simple and secure solutions for creating and managing user accounts in the company. With this solution, I can provide the implementation of the company's servers according to their size (small and medium companies)

first.title: University Institute of Technology
first.subtitle: University Diploma Of Technology, Network and Telecommunications
first.content: Network and telecommunications occupations include the understanding, installation, administration and maintenance of computer networks and telecommunications networks. The graduate of this DUT can practice in all organizations using the new technologies of information and communication (NICT). He masters the technologies found in local business networks (wired and wireless), long distance and internet telecommunications networks, multimedia access networks (fixed and mobile), corporate communication systems (videoconferencing. ..).

second.title: Higher Institute of Electronics of Paris
second.subtitle: Engineering Degree, Computer Science
second.content: As a software engineer I have expertise that allows me to intervene as a specialist in different environments, either at the design level or at the software implementation level. I have a global vision, going beyond the technical framework, which allows me to be the referent in terms of technical choices. In addition, my managerial skills allow me to quickly take responsibility for project management.

first.title: Magillem design Services
first.subject: Web Developer, spring framework
first.content: Magillem is a Leading Provider of Complex Design Flow and Content Management Software Solutions. Ecodex (e-Justice Communication via Online Data Exchange), is a european project that aims to improve the cross-border access of citizens and businesses to legal means in Europe, as well as to improve the interoperability between judicial authorities within of the EU. Functionality that provides an easier (digital) way to exchange legal information between EU countries. My role in this project was the development and design of forms views in java/2jee, this involves modeling, unit tests and optimization of interface development methods.

second.title: Cirruseo
second.subject: Python Developer
second.content: Cirruseo is the leading independent partner of Google Cloud in France, has developed its skills and partnerships around the major players in this market as Google, as well as more specialized players like Freshworks, Powertools for Google Drive, etc. Cirruseo's service offerings range from consulting, cloud trajectory definition, to BI and implementation of targeted solutions.
